simplesect.title: Brief Description
simplesect.para: This class is a used to store TANGO device server process data and to provide the user with a set of utilities method.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para: This class is implemented using the singleton design pattern. Therefore a device server process can have only one instance of this class and its constructor is not public.
